carpet.rule.sneakingGrowsPlants.desc: Each time a player sneaks, it will attempt to fertilize a random block around the player. If the block can be fertilized, it will be.
carpet.rule.sneakGrowingProbability.desc: The chance that the bonemeal is applied for sneakingGrowsPlants. It represents 1/n chance, and it must be a positive, non-zero integer.
carpet.rule.sneakGrowingRadius.desc: The radius in blocks that is randomly accessed. This area is a square centered on the player. It must be a positive, non-zero integer.
